jd:
Hi,

Business Analyst

Location: Philadelphia, PA

Responsibilities:

Requirements Gathering: Collaborate with stakeholders to understand and document business requirements related to healthcare claims processing.

System Analysis: Analyze existing systems and processes to identify areas for improvement and ensure they meet business needs.

Process Modeling: Develop and document process models to illustrate current and future states of the claims processing workflow.

Data Analysis: Perform data analysis to support decision-making and identify trends or issues in claims data.

Solution Design: Work with IT teams to design and implement system solutions that improve efficiency and accuracy in claims processing.

Testing and Validation: Develop test plans and conduct system testing to ensure solutions meet business requirements and are free of defects.

Training and Support: Provide training and support to end-users on new systems and processes.

Compliance: Ensure that all systems and processes comply with healthcare regulations and standards.

Skills:

Critical Thinking: Ability to analyze complex problems and develop effective solutions.

Technical Proficiency: Familiarity with healthcare claims systems, databases, and software tools.

Communication: Strong verbal and written communication skills to interact with stakeholders and document requirements.

Project Management: Ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines effectively.

Attention to Detail: Ensuring accuracy in data analysis and system documentation.

Collaboration: Work effectively with cross-functional teams, including IT, operations, and compliance departments.
